load_mock_components.code:
return [
  {
    id: "comp-001",
    sku: "RES-001",
    name: "10K Ohm Resistor",
    defaultLocation: "A1-B2",
    onHand: 150,
    inProgress: 25,
    reorderPoint: 100,
    status: "active"
  },
  {
    id: "comp-002", 
    sku: "CAP-001",
    name: "100uF Capacitor",
    defaultLocation: "A2-C1",
    onHand: 75,
    inProgress: 0,
    reorderPoint: 50,
    status: "active"
  },
  {
    id: "comp-003",
    sku: "IC-001", 
    name: "Arduino Uno R3",
    defaultLocation: "B1-A1",
    onHand: 12,
    inProgress: 5,
    reorderPoint: 20,
    status: "active"
  },
  {
    id: "comp-004",
    sku: "LED-001",
    name: "Red LED 5mm",
    defaultLocation: "C1-B2",
    onHand: 8,
    inProgress: 0,
    reorderPoint: 25,
    status: "active"
  },
  {
    id: "comp-005",
    sku: "SW-001",
    name: "Push Button Switch",
    defaultLocation: "D1-A1",
    onHand: 45,
    inProgress: 10,
    reorderPoint: 30,
    status: "inactive"
  }
];
